Studio Specialism 02: Future & Emerging Technologies  

Studio Specialism 02: Future and Emerging Technologies; focuses on blending digital emerging technology with visual communication. Students experiment with digital tools to create solutions for visual problems, resulting in a portfolio and project report. The module covers digital design ethics and anticipates future trends.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Research and gather information to support and develop solutions to a design brief. [Enquiry]

+  Use critical analysis to review, research, and identify audience expectations. [Analysis, visual analysis]

+  Convey information and meaning effectively using a range of specialist media, techniques and approaches. [Communication]

+  Evaluate the appropriateness of specialist media, techniques and approaches to propose solutions to a design brief. [Reflection]

+  Apply the knowledge and skills gained from research and specialist experimentation to produce resolved specialist outcomes. [Application, Working with others]
